00041 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 /** @defgroup MIDI_Private_Define MIDI private definitions
00043   * @{
00044   */
00045 /* MIDI TRIG ST Mask                                                                                        */
00046 #define TRIG_ST_ENABLE               (u32)0x00000400
00047 #define TRIG_ST_DISABLE              (u32)0xFFFFFBFF
00048 
00049 /* MIDI TRIG VM Mask                                                                                        */
00050 #define TRIG_VM_ENABLE               (u32)0x00000200
00051 #define TRIG_VM_DISABLE              (u32)0xFFFFFDFF
00052 
00053 /* MIDI TRIG FR Mask                                                                                        */
00054 #define TRIG_FR_ENABLE               (u32)0x00000100
00055 #define TRIG_FR_DISABLE              (u32)0xFFFFFEFF
00056 
00057 /* MIDI CHAN CHx Mask                                                                                       */
00058 #define MIDI_CHAN_CHx_MASK           (u32)0x0000001F
00059 
00060 /* MIDI FREQ BL Mask                                                                                        */
00061 #define MIDI_FREQ_BL_MASK            (u32)0x0000F000
00062 
00063 /* MIDI FREQ FR Mask                                                                                        */
00064 #define MIDI_FREQ_FR_MASK            (u32)0x00000FFF
00065 
00066 /* MIDI VOL AR Mask                                                                                         */
00067 #define MIDI_VOL_AR_MASK             (u32)0x80000000
00068 
00069 /* MIDI VOL ENV Mask                                                                                        */
00070 #define MIDI_VOL_ENV_MASK            (u32)0x60000000
00071 
00072 /* MIDI VOL VL Mask                                                                                         */
00073 #define MIDI_VOL_VL_MASK             (u32)0x03FF0000
00074 
00075 /* MIDI VOL VR Mask                                                                                         */
00076 #define MIDI_VOL_VR_MASK             (u32)0x000003FF
00077 
00078 /* MIDI RENUM WBS Mask                                                                                      */
00079 #define MIDI_RENUM_WBS_MASK          (u32)0x00030000
00080 
00081 /* MIDI RENUM RE Mask                                                                                       */
00082 #define MIDI_RENUM_RE_MASK           (u32)0x00007FFF
00083 
00084 /* MIDI MCUCH0 CH0B Mask                                                                                    */
00085 #define MIDI_MCUCH0_CH0B_MASK        (u32)0xFFFF0000
00086 
00087 /* MIDI MCUCH0 CH0A Mask                                                                                    */
00088 #define MIDI_MCUCH0_CH0A_MASK        (u32)0x0000FFFF
00089 
00090 /* MIDI MCUCH1 CH1B Mask                                                                                    */
00091 #define MIDI_MCUCH1_CH1B_MASK        (u32)0xFFFF0000
00092 
00093 /* MIDI MCUCH1 CH1A Mask                                                                                    */
00094 #define MIDI_MCUCH1_CH1A_MASK        (u32)0x0000FFFF
00095 
00096 /* MIDI MCUCH2 CH2B Mask                                                                                    */
00097 #define MIDI_MCUCH2_CH2B_MASK        (u32)0xFFFF0000
00098 
00099 /* MIDI MCUCH2 CH2A Mask                                                                                    */
00100 #define MIDI_MCUCH2_CH2A_MASK        (u32)0x0000FFFF
00101 
00102 /* MIDI MCUCH3 CH3B Mask                                                                                    */
00103 #define MIDI_MCUCH3_CH3B_MASK        (u32)0xFFFF0000
00104 
00105 /* MIDI MCUCH3 CH3A Mask                                                                                    */
00106 #define MIDI_MCUCH3_CH3A_MASK        (u32)0x0000FFFF
00107 
00108 /* MIDI CTRL MCUCHEN3 Mask                                                                                  */
00109 #define MCUCHEN3_ENABLE              (u32)0x00008000
00110 #define MCUCHEN3_DISABLE             (u32)0xFFFF7FFF
00111 
00112 /* MIDI CTRL MCUCHEN2 Mask                                                                                  */
00113 #define MCUCHEN2_ENABLE              (u32)0x00004000
00114 #define MCUCHEN2_DISABLE             (u32)0xFFFFBFFF
00115 
00116 /* MIDI CTRL MCUCHEN1 Mask                                                                                  */
00117 #define MCUCHEN1_ENABLE              (u32)0x00002000
00118 #define MCUCHEN1_DISABLE             (u32)0xFFFFDFFF
00119 
00120 /* MIDI CTRL MCUCHEN0 Mask                                                                                  */
00121 #define MCUCHEN0_ENABLE              (u32)0x00001000
00122 #define MCUCHEN0_DISABLE             (u32)0xFFFFEFFF
00123 
00124 /* MIDI CTRL DACDS Mask                                                                                     */
00125 #define MIDI_CTRL_DACDS_MASK         (u32)0x00000700
00126 
00127 /* MIDI CTRL MUSICEN Mask                                                                                   */
00128 #define MUSICEN_ENABLE               (u32)0x00000080
00129 #define MUSICEN_DISABLE              (u32)0xFFFFFF7F
00130 
00131 /* MIDI CTRL SPIRDEN Mask                                                                                   */
00132 #define SPIRDEN_ENABLE               (u32)0x00000040
00133 #define SPIRDEN_DISABLE              (u32)0xFFFFFFBF
00134 
00135 /* MIDI CTRL SPIDISLOOP Mask                                                                                */
00136 #define SPIDISLOOP_ENABLE            (u32)0x00000020
00137 #define SPIDISLOOP_DISABLE           (u32)0xFFFFFFDF
00138 
00139 /* MIDI CTRL CHS Mask                                                                                       */
00140 #define MIDI_CTRL_CHS_MASK           (u32)0x00000007

00146 /** @defgroup MIDI_Exported_Functions MIDI exported functions
00147   * @{
00148   */
00149 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00150  * @brief Deinitialize the MIDI peripheral registers to their default reset values.
00151  * @retval None
00152  ************************************************************************************************************/
00153 void MIDI_DeInit(void)
00154 {
00155   RSTCU_PeripReset_TypeDef RSTCUReset = {{0}};
00156 
00157   RSTCUReset.Bit.MIDI = 1;
00158   RSTCU_PeripReset(RSTCUReset, ENABLE);
00159 }
00160 
00161 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00162   * @brief  Initialize the MIDIx peripheral according to the specified parameters in the MIDI_InitStruct.
00163   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00164   * @param  MIDI_InitStruct: pointer to a MIDI_InitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration
00165   *   information for the specified MIDI peripheral.
00166   * @retval None
00167   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00168 void MIDI_Init(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, MIDI_InitTypeDef* MIDI_InitStruct)
00169 {
00170   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00171   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00172   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_DACDS(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_DACDS));
00173   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN));
00174   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP));
00175   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_CHS(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_CHS));
00176   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_FREQ_BL(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_FREQ_BL));
00177   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_FREQ_FR(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_FREQ_FR));
00178   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_VOL_AR(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_AR));
00179   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_VOL_ENV(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_ENV));
00180   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_VOL_VL(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_VL));
00181   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_VOL_VR(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_VR));
00182   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_STADDR(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_STADDR));
00183   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_RENUM_WBS(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_RENUM_WBS));
00184   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_RENUM_RE(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_RENUM_RE));
00185   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_ENDADDR(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_ENDADDR));
00186   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CHAN_ST(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_ST));
00187   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CHAN_VM(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_VM));
00188   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CHAN_FR(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_FR));
00189   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CHAN_CHx(MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_CHx));
00190 
00191   MIDIx->CTRL = ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_DACDS) << 8) |
00192                 ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN) << 7) |
00193                 ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP) << 6) |
00194                 (MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_CHS);
00195 
00196   MIDIx->FREQ = ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_FREQ_BL) << 12) |
00197                 (MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_FREQ_FR);
00198 
00199   MIDIx->VOL = ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_AR) << 31) |
00200                ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_ENV) << 29) |
00201                ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_VL) << 16) |
00202                (MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_VR);
00203 
00204   MIDIx->ST_ADDR = MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_STADDR;
00205 
00206   MIDIx->RE_NUM = ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_RENUM_WBS) << 16) |
00207                   (MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_RENUM_RE);
00208 
00209   MIDIx->END_ADDR = MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_ENDADDR;
00210 
00211   MIDIx->CHAN = ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_ST) << 10) |
00212                 ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_VM) << 9) |
00213                 ((MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_FR) << 8) |
00214                 (MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_CHx);
00215 }
00216 
00217 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00218   * @brief  Fill each MIDI_InitStruct member with its default value.
00219   * @param  MIDI_InitStruct: pointer to an MIDI_InitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.
00220   * @retval None
00221   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00222 void MIDI_StructInit(MIDI_InitTypeDef* MIDI_InitStruct)
00223 {
00224   /* Initialize the MIDI_CTRL_DACDS member                                                                  */
00225   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_DACDS = 0x0;
00226 
00227   /* Initialize the MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN member                                                                */
00228   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN = DISABLE;
00229 
00230   /* Initialize the MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP member                                                             */
00231   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP = DISABLE;
00232 
00233   /* Initialize the MIDI_CTRL_CHS member                                                                    */
00234   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CTRL_CHS = CHS16;
00235 
00236   /* Initialize the MIDI_FREQ_BL member                                                                     */
00237   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_FREQ_BL = BL0;
00238 
00239   /* Initialize the MIDI_FREQ_FR member                                                                     */
00240   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_FREQ_FR = 0x0;
00241 
00242   /* Initialize the MIDI_VOL_AR member                                                                      */
00243   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_AR = ENV_RELEASE;
00244 
00245   /* Initialize the MIDI_VOL_ENV member                                                                     */
00246   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_ENV = ENV_NO;
00247 
00248   /* Initialize the MIDI_VOL_VL member                                                                      */
00249   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_VL = 0x3FF;
00250 
00251   /* Initialize the MIDI_VOL_VR member                                                                      */
00252   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_VOL_VR = 0x3FF;
00253 
00254   /* Initialize the MIDI_STADDR member                                                                      */
00255   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_STADDR = 0x0;
00256 
00257   /* Initialize the MIDI_RENUM_WBS member                                                                   */
00258   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_RENUM_WBS = WBS8;
00259 
00260   /* Initialize the MIDI_RENUM_RE member                                                                    */
00261   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_RENUM_RE = 0x0;
00262 
00263   /* Initialize the MIDI_ENDADDR member                                                                     */
00264   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_ENDADDR = 0x0;
00265 
00266   /* Initialize the MIDI_CHAN_ST member                                                                     */
00267   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_ST = DISABLE;
00268 
00269   /* Initialize the MIDI_CHAN_VM member                                                                     */
00270   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_VM = DISABLE;
00271 
00272   /* Initialize the MIDI_CHAN_FR member                                                                     */
00273   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_FR = DISABLE;
00274 
00275   /* Initialize the MIDI_CHAN_CHx member                                                                    */
00276   MIDI_InitStruct->MIDI_CHAN_CHx = MIDI_CHx0;
00277 }
00278 
00279 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00280   * @brief  Enable or Disable the specified MIDI interrupt.
00281   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00282   * @param  MIDI_Int: specify if the MIDI interrupt source to be enabled or disabled.
00283   *   This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
00284   *     @arg MIDIO_DMAEN             : MIDIO DMAEN
00285   *     @arg MIDII_DMAEN             : MIDII DMAEN
00286   *     @arg MIDI_INTEN              : MIDI INTEN
00287   * @param  NewState: new state of the MIDI interrupts.
00288   *   This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
00289   * @retval None
00290   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00291 void MIDI_IntConfig(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, u32 MIDI_Int, ControlStatus NewState)
00292 {
00293   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00294   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00295   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_INT(MIDI_Int));
00296   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00297 
00298   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00299   {
00300     MIDIx->IER |= MIDI_Int;
00301   }
00302   else
00303   {
00304     MIDIx->IER &= (u32)~MIDI_Int;
00305   }
00306 }
00307 
00308 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00309   * @brief  Check whether the specified MIDI flag has been set or not.
00310   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00311   * @param  MIDI_Flag: specify the flag that is to be check.
00312   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00313   *     @arg MIDI_INTF             : MIDI int flag
00314   * @retval The new state of MIDI_Flag (SET or RESET).
00315   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00316 FlagStatus MIDI_GetFlagStatus(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, u32 MIDI_Flag)
00317 {
00318   FlagStatus bitstatus = RESET;
00319   u32 statusreg = 0;
00320 
00321   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00322   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00323   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_FLAG(MIDI_Flag));
00324 
00325   statusreg = MIDIx->SR;
00326 
00327   if ((statusreg & MIDI_Flag) != (u32)RESET)
00328   {
00329     bitstatus = SET;
00330   }
00331   else
00332   {
00333     bitstatus = RESET;
00334   }
00335 
00336   return bitstatus;
00337 }
00338 
00339 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00340   * @brief  Clear the specified MIDI flag.
00341   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00342   * @param  MIDI_Flag: specify the flag that is to be cleared.
00343   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00344   *     @arg MIDI_INTF            : MIDI INTF
00345   * @retval None
00346   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00347 void MIDI_ClearFlag(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, u32 MIDI_Flag)
00348 {
00349   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00350   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00351   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_FLAG_CLEAR(MIDI_Flag));
00352 
00353   MIDIx->SR = MIDI_Flag;
00354 }
00355 
00356 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00357   * @brief  Configure the Channel for the selected MIDI.
00358   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00359   * @param  MCUCHEN3: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00360   * @param  MCUCHEN2: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00361   * @param  MCUCHEN1: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00362   * @param  MCUCHEN0: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00363   * @param  DACDS: specify the clipping and distorting volume of the MIDI.
00364   * @param  MUSICEN: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00365   * @param  SPIRDEN: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00366   * @param  SPIDISLOOP: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00367   * @param  CHS: specify channel selection of the MIDI.
00368   * @retval None
00369   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00370 void MIDI_CTRL(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx,
00371                MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN3_Enum MCUCHEN3, MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN2_Enum MCUCHEN2,
00372                MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN1_Enum MCUCHEN1, MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN0_Enum MCUCHEN0,
00373                u8 DACDS,
00374                MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN_Enum MUSICEN,
00375                MIDI_CTRL_SPIRDEN_Enum SPIRDEN, MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP_Enum SPIDISLOOP,
00376                MIDI_CTRL_CHS_Enum CHS)
00377 {
00378   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00379   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00380   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN3(MCUCHEN3));
00381   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN2(MCUCHEN2));
00382   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN1(MCUCHEN1));
00383   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN0(MCUCHEN0));
00384   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_DACDS(DACDS));
00385   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN(MUSICEN));
00386   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_SPIRDEN(SPIRDEN));
00387   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP(SPIDISLOOP));
00388   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_CHS(CHS));
00389 
00390   MIDIx->CTRL = (MCUCHEN3 << 15) | (MCUCHEN2 << 14) | (MCUCHEN1 << 13) | (MCUCHEN0 << 12) |
00391                 (DACDS << 8) |
00392                 (MUSICEN << 7) |
00393                 (SPIRDEN << 6) | (SPIDISLOOP << 5) |
00394                  CHS;
00395 }
00396 
00397 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00398   * @brief  Configure the FREQ for the selected MIDI.
00399   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00400   * @param  BL: specify octave of the MIDI.
00401   * @param  FR: specify pitch of the MIDI.
00402   * @retval None
00403   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00404 void MIDI_FREQ(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, MIDI_FREQ_BL_Enum BL, u16 FR)
00405 {
00406   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00407   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00408   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_FREQ_BL(BL));
00409   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_FREQ_FR(FR));
00410 
00411   MIDIx->FREQ = (BL << 12) | FR;
00412 }
00413 
00414 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00415   * @brief  Configure the VOL for the selected MIDI.
00416   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00417   * @param  A_R: specify attack or release of the MIDI.
00418   * @param  ENV: specify envelope of the MIDI.
00419   * @param  VL: specify left channel of the MIDI.
00420   * @param  VR: specify right channel of the MIDI.
00421   * @retval None
00422   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00423 void MIDI_VOL(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, MIDI_VOL_AR_Enum A_R, MIDI_VOL_ENV_Enum ENV, u16 VL, u16 VR)
00424 {
00425   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00426   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00427   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_VOL_AR(A_R));
00428   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_VOL_ENV(ENV));
00429   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_VOL_VL(VL));
00430   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_VOL_VR(VR));
00431 
00432   MIDIx->VOL = (A_R << 31) | (ENV << 29) | (VL << 16) | VR;
00433 }
00434 
00435 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00436   * @brief  Configure the Start Address for the selected MIDI.
00437   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00438   * @param  ST_ADDR: specify start address of the MIDI.
00439   * @retval None
00440   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00441 void MIDI_STADDR(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, u32 ST_ADDR)
00442 {
00443   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00444   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00445   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_STADDR(ST_ADDR));
00446 
00447   MIDIx->ST_ADDR = ST_ADDR;
00448 }
00449 
00450 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00451   * @brief  Configure the RENUM for the selected MIDI.
00452   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00453   * @param  WBS: specify waveform of the MIDI.
00454   * @param  RE: specify repeated code of the MIDI.
00455   * @retval None
00456   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00457 void MIDI_RENUM(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, MIDI_RENUM_WBS_Enum WBS, u16 RE)
00458 {
00459   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00460   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00461   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_RENUM_WBS(WBS));
00462   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_RENUM_RE(RE));
00463 
00464   MIDIx->RE_NUM = (WBS << 16) | RE;
00465 }
00466 
00467 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00468   * @brief  Configure the End Address for the selected MIDI.
00469   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00470   * @param  END_ADDR: specify end address of the MIDI.
00471   * @retval None
00472   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00473 void MIDI_ENDADDR(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, u32 END_ADDR)
00474 {
00475   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00476   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00477   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_ENDADDR(END_ADDR));
00478 
00479   MIDIx->END_ADDR = END_ADDR;
00480 }
00481 
00482 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00483   * @brief  Configure the Channel for the selected MIDI.
00484   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00485   * @param  TRIG_ST: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00486   * @param  TRIG_VM: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00487   * @param  TRIG_FR: this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00488   * @param  CHx: specify selected channel of the MIDI.
00489   * @retval None
00490   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00491 void MIDI_CHAN(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx,
00492                MIDI_CHAN_ST_Enum TRIG_ST, MIDI_CHAN_VM_Enum TRIG_VM, MIDI_CHAN_FR_Enum TRIG_FR,
00493                u8 CHx)
00494 {
00495   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00496   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00497   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CHAN_ST(TRIG_ST));
00498   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CHAN_VM(TRIG_VM));
00499   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CHAN_FR(TRIG_FR));
00500   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CHAN_CHx(CHx));
00501 
00502   MIDIx->CHAN = (TRIG_ST << 10) | (TRIG_VM << 9) | (TRIG_FR << 8) | CHx;
00503 }
00504 
00505 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00506   * @brief  Configure the MCU CH0 DATA for the selected MIDI.
00507   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00508   * @param  CH0B: specify DATA[31:16] of MCU CH0 of the MIDI.
00509   * @param  CH0A: specify DATA[15:0] of MCU CH0 of the MIDI.
00510   * @retval None
00511   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00512 void MIDI_MCUCH0(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, u16 CH0B, u16 CH0A)
00513 {
00514   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00515   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00516   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_MCUCHx11_BH(CH0B));
00517   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_MCUCHx11_BL(CH0A));
00518 
00519   MIDIx->MCU_CH0 = (CH0B << 16) | CH0A;
00520 }
00521 
00522 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00523   * @brief  Configure the MCU CH1 DATA for the selected MIDI.

00573 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00574   * @brief  Configure the FREQ BL for the selected MIDI.
00575   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00576   * @param  BL: specify octave of the MIDI.
00577   * @retval None
00578   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00579 void MIDI_FREQ_BL(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, MIDI_FREQ_BL_Enum BL)
00580 {
00581   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00582   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00583   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_FREQ_BL(BL));
00584 
00585   /* Clear BL[3:0] in FREQ                                                                                  */
00586   MIDIx->FREQ &= (u32)~MIDI_FREQ_BL_MASK;
00587 
00588   /* Set new BL[3:0] in FREQ                                                                                */
00589   MIDIx->FREQ |= (BL << 12);
00590 }

00725 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00726   * @brief  Enable or Disable ST ADDR for the specified MIDI peripheral.
00727   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00728   * @param  NewState: new state of the MIDIx peripheral.
00729   *   This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
00730   * @retval None
00731   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00732 void MIDI_CHAN_STCmd(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, ControlStatus NewState)
00733 {
00734   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00735   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00736   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00737 
00738   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00739   {
00740     MIDIx->CHAN |= TRIG_ST_ENABLE;
00741   }
00742   else
00743   {
00744     MIDIx->CHAN &= (TRIG_ST_DISABLE);
00745   }
00746 }
00747 
00748 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00749   * @brief  Enable or Disable VM for the specified MIDI peripheral.
00750   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00751   * @param  NewState: new state of the MIDIx peripheral.
00752   *   This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
00753   * @retval None
00754   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00755 void MIDI_CHAN_VMCmd(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, ControlStatus NewState)
00756 {
00757   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00758   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00759   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00760 
00761   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00762   {
00763     MIDIx->CHAN |= TRIG_VM_ENABLE;
00764   }
00765   else
00766   {
00767     MIDIx->CHAN &= (TRIG_VM_DISABLE);
00768   }
00769 }
00770

00772   * @brief  Enable or Disable FR for the specified MIDI peripheral.
00773   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00774   * @param  NewState: new state of the MIDIx peripheral.
00775   *   This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
00776   * @retval None

00960 
00961   /* Set new CH3A[16:0] in MCUCH3                                                                           */
00962   MIDIx->MCU_CH3 |= CH3A;
00963 }
00964 
00965 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00966   * @brief  Enable or Disable MCU CHEN3 for the specified MIDI peripheral.
00967   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00968   * @param  NewState: new state of the MIDIx peripheral.
00969   *   This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
00970   * @retval None
00971   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00972 void MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN3(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, ControlStatus NewState)
00973 {
00974   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00975   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00976   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00977 
00978   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00979   {
00980     MIDIx->CTRL |= MCUCHEN3_ENABLE;
00981   }
00982   else
00983   {
00984     MIDIx->CTRL &= MCUCHEN3_DISABLE;
00985   }
00986 }
00987 
00988 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00989   * @brief  Enable or Disable MCU CHEN2 for the specified MIDI peripheral.
00990   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
00991   * @param  NewState: new state of the MIDIx peripheral.
00992   *   This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
00993   * @retval None
00994   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00995 void MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN2(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, ControlStatus NewState)
00996 {
00997   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00998   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
00999   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
01000 
01001   if (NewState != DISABLE)
01002   {
01003     MIDIx->CTRL |= MCUCHEN2_ENABLE;
01004   }
01005   else
01006   {
01007     MIDIx->CTRL &= MCUCHEN2_DISABLE;
01008   }
01009 }

01054   }

01056 
01057 
01058 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
01059   * @brief  Configure the DACDS for the selected MIDI.
01060   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
01061   * @param  DACDS: specify the clipping and distorting volume of the MIDI.
01062   * @retval None
01063   ***********************************************************************************************************/
01064 void MIDI_CTRL_DACDS(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, u8 DACDS)
01065 {
01066   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
01067   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
01068   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_DACDS(DACDS));
01069 
01070   /* Clear DACDS[2:0] in CTRL                                                                               */
01071   MIDIx->CTRL &= (u32)~MIDI_CTRL_DACDS_MASK;
01072 
01073   /* Set new DACDS[2:0] in CTRL                                                                             */
01074   MIDIx->CTRL |= (DACDS << 8);
01075 }
01076

01082   * @retval None
01083   ***********************************************************************************************************/
01084 void MIDI_CTRL_MUSICENCmd(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, ControlStatus NewState)

01097   }
01098 }

01146 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
01147   * @brief  Configure the Channel Selection for the selected MIDI.
01148   * @param  MIDIx: where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
01149   * @param  CHS: specify channel selection of the MIDI.
01150   * @retval None
01151   ***********************************************************************************************************/
01152 void MIDI_CTRL_CHS(HT_MIDI_TypeDef* MIDIx, u8 CHS)
01153 {
01154   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
01155   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI(MIDIx));
01156   Assert_Param(IS_MIDI_CTRL_CHS(CHS));
01157 
01158   /* Clear CHS[2:0] in CTRL                                                                                 */
01159   MIDIx->CTRL &= (u32)~MIDI_CTRL_CHS_MASK;
01160 
01161   /* Set new CHS[2:0] in CTRL                                                                               */
01162   MIDIx->CTRL |= CHS;
01163 }
